title: The Energy carol
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Conservation and Renewable Energy Branch, Energy, Mines and Resources Canada, Wolf Koenig, Sidney Goldsmith and Les Drew
brief_description: An animated film dealing with conservation of energy resources. Ebenezer Scrooge has a motto: to waste is to grow. His motto becomes: back to basics. “The Energy carol” traces this momentous transformation, and introduces us to the spirits of energy past, present and future (Award: New York)
